title: As The Crow Flies

quote_first: Normally an assistant would have put [the television] on for him at
quote_last: . He sat watching a Nigerian woman give a talk on dressmaking, followed by the weather forecast man who supplied Eduardo with the revealing information that the temperature would continue to be hot for the next month.
title: The Coup
